articles.description: The “Lucky 13” promo will charge a flat $33 fee for riders who take 13 or more trips using OMNY between midnight Monday and 11:59 p.m. Sunday.
articles.content:
Subway and bus riders who use the MTAs OMNY tap-and-go payment system for 13 or more trips will be automatically upgraded to an unlimited weekly pass starting Monday.

articles.title: Legal Sea Foods founder George Berkowitz dies at 97 - WCVB Boston
articles.description: Over the years the restaurant chain, which started as a fish market, has featured traditional New England seafood that won a range of national accolades.
articles.content:
DEDHAM, Mass. —George Berkowitz, who founded the seafood restaurant chain Legal Sea Foods, has died in a Boston suburb. He was 97.
